quotes.quote: It was a messy race but Accumulate got the job done which is the main thing. He could run again this year but we'll have to see how he comes out of this - Roger Varian, trainer.

stable_tour.quote: He could start off at Ascot on May 10 in a Class 2 handicap over seven furlongs and we'll see if he develops into a horse for the Britannia. He's that kind of horse and hasn't done much wrong so far. 25-04-24

runners.name: Cheval Victorious
runners.comment: Offered little in two 6f outings here and needs to show much more to enter calculations
runners.spotlight: Offered little in two 6f outings here and needs to show much more to enter calculations.

runners.name: Rising From Ashes
runners.comment: On a lengthy losing run; sole bright spot this term was a second over C&D in January
runners.spotlight: On a lengthy losing run and hasn't threatened often; sole bright spot this term was a staying-on second over C&D in January.

runners.name: Mr Vigor
runners.owner: 23/24 Danny Shum Chap Shing Trainer Syndicate
runners.comment: Well held in three local starts; future may lie in lower grades
runners.spotlight: Well held in three local starts and yet to show any real promise; future may lie in lower grades.

runners.name: New Forest
runners.comment: Showed early potential after arriving in Hong Kong but took a backward step last time
runners.spotlight: Showed early potential after arriving in Hong Kong but took a backward step over C&D last time; needs to get back on track.

runners.name: Meowth
runners.comment: Landed a surprise win on debut in a Class 4 event but has been hit-and-miss since
runners.spotlight: Landed a surprise win on debut in a Class 4 event but has been hit-and-miss since; clearly has ability and could strike again if everything clicks.

10:10.race_name: Pok Fu Lam Country Park Handicap (Class 3) (3yo+) (Course C) (Turf)

runners.name: Call Me Glorious
runners.comment: Yet to win this season but ran big race in defeat a fortnight ago
runners.spotlight: Yet to win this season but ran big race from the front when close second over C&D a fortnight ago; has the same awkward draw in stall 10 today but remains well handicapped.

runners.name: Lifeline Express
runners.comment: Consistent 4yo who followed his C&D win in March with a staying-on second last month
runners.spotlight: Consistent 4yo who followed his C&D win in March with a staying-on second here last month; drawn much wider today, though, and remains on a career-high mark.

runners.name: Aeris Nova

prev_owners.owner: C Bennett, Flying Start Fine Scent Et Al

runners.comment: C&D winner in March and encountered traffic before finishing well here last month
runners.spotlight: Evidently suited by the drop back in trip when opening Hong Kong account with narrow C&D win in March, and encountered some traffic before staying on well for a close third here last month; may still have a bigger run in him; high on the list.

runners.name: Super Legends
runners.comment: Ran well when third over C&D last month; 10lb claimer Britney Wong enlisted today
runners.spotlight: Three C&D wins this season; probably on a tough mark now but gave good account when keeping-on third here a fortnight ago and 10lb claimer Britney Wong is enlisted today.

runners.name: One More
runners.owner: Dr & Mrs Johnny Ng Sai Chun Et Al

prev_owners.owner: Bryan Spong, Taryn Spong Et Al

runners.comment: Promising in South Africa last year; unlucky not to finish closer than eighth on HK debut
runners.spotlight: Looked very promising in South Africa last year and was unlucky not to finish much closer than eighth on recent Hong Kong debut (5f), given he was denied a clear run and coasted home from 1 1/2f out; Zac Purton keeps the ride; needs to be taken very seriously.

runners.name: Righteous Arion
runners.comment: Career-best form when winning here in February; seemingly on a tough mark now
runners.spotlight: Posted career-best performance when narrow C&D winner in February but subsequent efforts suggest he's in the grip of the handicapper now; favourable draw not enough to tempt.

runners.name: Marvel And Gold
runners.comment: Always outpaced and behind when a big-priced outsider for Hong Kong debut six weeks ago
runners.spotlight: 2-2 over 6f when trained in New Zealand (maiden/handicap) but always outpaced and behind when a big-priced outsider for Hong Kong debut six weeks ago (5f).

runners.name: Regal Gem

prev_owners.owner: D Bishop P Robinson S Bland T Coyle

runners.comment: Began HK career with two encouraging fifths (6f/7f); not ruled out each-way
runners.spotlight: Dual 6f winner as a 2yo in Britain and launched Hong Kong career with two encouraging runs this year (6f/7f); not ruled out each-way.

runners.name: Ahren
runners.comment: Unexposed 3yo; up in grade after comfortable C&D win last month; respected
runners.spotlight: Unexposed 3yo who delivered on earlier promise when winning comfortably over C&D four weeks ago; moves up in grade today but could easily have a lot more to offer.

runners.name: California Bay
runners.comment: Runner-up in both starts in Australia last year; has outside draw for Hong Kong debut
runners.spotlight: Runner-up in both starts in Australia last year (6.5f/7f) but makes Hong Kong debut after a 220-day absence and has the outside draw.

runners.name: Big Return
runners.comment: Singapore import who was a down-the-field outsider on his first two Hong Kong starts
runners.spotlight: Singapore import who was a down-the-field outsider on his first two Hong Kong starts (5f/6f).

runners.name: Genius Baby
runners.owner: Mr & Mrs Pang Wai Hak, Frankie Pang Ka Yeung & A Pang Ka Wai
runners.comment: Latest run was more encouraging but significant further improvement is needed
runners.spotlight: Ex-Australian 3yo; took step in right direction when fairly respectable eighth at Happy Valley (6f) ten days ago, his third Hong Kong run, but needs significant further improvement today.

runners.name: Charm Stone
runners.owner: Sheamus Mills Bloodstock Ladies, Newton Ladies Et Al

runners.name: Climbing Star
runners.owner: Mrs A Stokes, J Robinson Et Al

prev_owners.owner: P Stokes, J Robinson Et Al
Qatar Bloodstock Ltd, P J Stokes Et Al

runners.name: Sghirripa
runners.owner: Mrs J M Oxlade, Bdf Racing Et Al

prev_owners.owner: Mrs J M Oxlade, K D J Schubert Et Al

runners.name: Watchme Win
runners.owner: A J Hehir, D W Rasheed Et Al

runners.name: Sir Sway
runners.owner: Send The Fleet, Good Fourth Racing Et Al

runners.name: Stretan Angel
runners.owner: J M Maclean, Going Again Syndicate Et Al

prev_owners.owner: J M Maclean, Going Again Syndicate Et Al

runners.name: Giga Kick
runners.breeder: G S A Bloodstock Pty Ltd

runners.name: Reserve Bank
runners.owner: S Tsalikidis, C Cortese Et Al

runners.name: Press Down
runners.owner: P J Hardacre, I P Perkins Et Al

runners.name: Volcanic Express
runners.owner: W P Fargher, Mrs B G Fargher Et Al

runners.name: Generosity
runners.owner: S A Millier, X D Franklin Et Al

prev_owners.owner: Kratzie No 29, P R Lewis Et Al
G D Guest, Ms J V Kewish Et Al

runners.name: Brave Design
runners.owner: Dob Racing Our Design Synd, S Crow Et Al

runners.name: Sir Myka
runners.owner: T J Doudle, S D Bland Et Al

runners.name: Salty Pearl
runners.owner: Starblue Racing Tlo Malice, Cmr Lof Et Al

runners.name: Morgana
runners.owner: Mrs C S Ryan & J Pace

runners.name: Maldivica
runners.owner: C M Bieg, M D Hey Et Al

runners.name: Freedom Flame
runners.owner: B H Perks & Ms A M Clough

runners.name: Shocap
runners.owner: Done Up Racing Syndicate, J Martin Et Al

runners.name: Synthesise
runners.owner: P R Gunner & D R Wagner
